price: ߤߊߟߌ߬ ߊ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߕߘߍ߬ ߞߘߐ߬ߡߊ߲߫ ߞߏ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߖߌ߰ߕߍ߰ߓߊ߰ߕߐ ߟߋ߫ ߕߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߊ߲ߖߌ ߣߊ߭ ߢߍ߫
arabic: وَإِن كَانُواْ مِن قَبۡلِ أَن يُنَزَّلَ عَلَيۡهِم مِّن قَبۡلِهِۦ لَمُبۡلِسِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-in kānū min qabli an yunazzala ʿalayhim min qablihi lamub'lisīna
